name: BLINDSIGHTED (itch)
description:
**FLASH WARNING**

Escape superhell - your infinitely looping, black and white limbo of torment - using only your muzzle flash and some flares to see the demonic amalgamations launching towards you. 

Try out all 4 guns in 15 high intensity trials that test your aim, perception, and object permanence while a condescending god belittles you with every failure.

>> PRESS ESCAPE IN GAME TO VIEW CONTROLS <<

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Dash - Left Shift

Fire Gun - Left Click

Shoot Flare - Right Click

Restart Level - Backspace

God Mode - Alt + F4

Made in 7 days for the Black and White Jam #0.(9)

Created by Digital Arts members:

>>>   Xander Beaky - Programming, Design, Producer   <<<

>>> Neboo - Music, SFX, Implementation, 3D Modeling   <<<

>>>   Greg - 3D Modeling   <<<

>>>   Charlie - 3D Modeling   <<<

>>>   Sam Kollmansberger - Concept art   <<<  

Join us! 

We are an open game dev team that takes high-school aged people from any skill level and helps facilitate growth of anything game dev - programming, art, music, design, or anything else that people are interested in!
